channel.title: Weddings
channel.description: Hey, what do you guys think of weddings in mopar? like when you use a ring on somone they get the ring, a menu pops up saying so and so wants to marry u and theres a yes or no answer, if yes u get teled to a church and recieve prince robe for the man, princess for the woman, she also gets flowers etc. and 2 rings (male gets diamond to give woman, woman get gold ring to give man) u use the rings on each other and vuala ur maried. You guys think I should try doing this, also if anyone is good at coding and can help post :p

@0.o wrote:

les, i tried cases but with p2. in front of the stuff it doesnt work right =[br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2007, 03:11:46 PM[/size][hr][quote=“0.o, post:33, topic:109804”]i do, i cant get it to do ne thing when u hit yes or no, i want it to do this -

If yes I want it to do this -
teleportToX = 3244; teleportToY = 3209; p2.teleportToX = 3243; p2.teleportToY = 3209;

If no I want it to do this -
deleteItem(1643, getItemSlot(1643), 1);[/quote]
Get that to work and i luv u 4 ever lol

heres what i got so far

if(itemUseID == 1643) { // Marage by 0.o (Liquid) deleteItem(1643, getItemSlot(1643), 1); sendMessage("You purpose."); p2.sendMessage("Somone purposed to you!"); p2.addItem(1643, 1); } if(itemUseID == 1643) { // Marage by 0.o (Liquid) p2.sendFrame171(1, 2465); p2.sendFrame171(0, 2468); p2.sendFrame126("Do you want to mary "+playerName+"?", 2460); p2.sendFrame126("Yes!", 2461); p2.sendFrame126("No!", 2462); p2.sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true;

item.title: Weddings
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

Add These

/*Preach*/
	public boolean holypray = false;
	public boolean holypray1 = false;
	public boolean holypray2 = false;
	public boolean holypray3 = false;
	public boolean holypray4 = false;
	public boolean preach1, preach2, preach3;
	public int preachTimer = 0;
	public int preaching = 0;

Control F:

if(PoisonClear >= 15) {

Under That
Add this

if (preachTimer > 0){
        	preachTimer -= 1;
        }
        if (holypray1 && preach2 && preachTimer <= 0){
			txt4 = "Protector of us all,";
			string4UpdateRequired = true;
			preachTimer = 7;
			preach2 = false;
			preach3 = true;
		}
		if (holypray1 && preach3 && preachTimer <= 0){
			txt4 = "I now join you in the eyes of Saradomin.";
			string4UpdateRequired = true;
			preach3 = false;
			preaching = 1;
		}

Find

//check banking

and after it add

Add this

//Pray check
		if (preaching > 0){
			preaching();
		}

and that’s all i got so far… looking good for the npc talking?

Read full topic
